de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.optics

Class ClusterOrderResult<E extends ClusterOrderEntry<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.AbstractHierarchicalResult
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.BasicResult
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.optics.ClusterOrderResult<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - entry type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, Relation<E>, HierarchicalResult, IterableResult<E>, Result, Iterable<E>

    public class ClusterOrderResult<E extends ClusterOrderEntry<?>>
extends BasicResult
implements IterableResult<E>, Relation<E>
    Class to store the result of an ordering clustering algorithm such as OPTICS.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • iterDBIDs

        public DBIDIter iterDBIDs()
        Description copied from interface: Relation
        Get an iterator access to the DBIDs. To iterate over all IDs, use the following code fragment: 
         
 for(DBIDIter iter = relation.iterDBIDs(); iter.valid(); iter.advance()) {
    relation.get(iter); // Get the current element
 }
        Specified by:
        iterDBIDs in interface Relation<E extends ClusterOrderEntry<?>>
        Returns:
        iterator for the DBIDs.
